title: Ward Skins
body: Could Riot implement a system for when you have multiple ward skins, for them to be random when you put them down? Obviously you can still choose if you just want to use one in a game, but it would be cool if there was an option to randomise the ward skin in game. Thoughts?

replies.body: I'd prefer to have a different ward for the different types (green ward, pink ward and trinket). I'd like to know what i'm gonna get when i place it but have more then one variation while in game.

totally, at least some form of choice, but there are multiple wards to skin in game! you raise an excellent point. there is also sightstone. could also be skinned differently. i just want them out of shop and in my profile somewhere mainly.
Yes please. This is such a beautiful suggestion
Is there someway to get Riot to read this. Or some way to ask them directly?

LOL lets ask for a system where you can pick your ward skins in champ select like you can your champ skin rather than asking for fancier things first

would probably sell more ward skins though.
